---
title: "Enumerate graphs and partitions"
---

"Enumerate graphs and partitions" is a pdf vignette. 
At present, pkgdown (the R package used to create this website) does not support
pdf vignettes; see
[pkgdown issue 781](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown/issues/781). 
When Pv3Rs is on CRAN, this signpost will be replaced by a link to the pdf
vignette on CRAN. For the time being, please access "Enumerate graphs and
partitions" by installing Pv3Rs and calling 
`vignette(topic = "enumerate", package = "Pv3Rs")` in R.
